Sorry to divert off topic, but you do realise that these spam messages
are =
placed by automated "robots" that browse the net looking for
forums and ema=
ils to automatically register for, and place their spam
messages?
These guy=
s never return to view their messages, so changing them in
any form does no=
thing at all to deter them. They will never see the
altered message.

Best =
to just delete them and carry on.

Brian
